problem: 如图▱ABCD中,AC,BD相交于O,过O点的直线与一组对边分别相交于E,F,图中阴影部分的总面积为2,则▱ABCD的面积是()
answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴OA=OC,AB∥CD,AB=DC,BC=AD,∠DAC=∠BCA,∴∠AEO=∠CFO,在△AEO与△CFO中,≥ft\{\begin{matrix}∠EAO=∠FCO\\∠AEO=∠CFO\\AO=CO\\\end{matrix}\right.\,∴△AEO≌△CFO,∴阴影部分的总面积=S~△ABD~=\frac{1}{2}S~四边形ABCD~=2,∴S~四边形ABCD~=4．故选:D．
comment: 题主要考查了平行四边形的性质以及全等三角形的判定和性质,能够根据三角形全等,从而将阴影部分的面积转化为平行四边形面积的一半,是解决问题的关键．
problem_en: As shown in ▱ABCD, AC and BD intersect at O, and the straight line passing through O intersects with a set of opposite edges at E and F respectively. The total area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is N_0, then the area of ​​▱ABCD is ()
